questions.question: The Doppler effect does not depend on the

explanations.a: It affects the observed frequency due to movement.
explanations.b: Observer velocity is part of the Doppler effect.
explanations.c: Source velocity affects the frequency shift.
explanations.d: Correct – Distance doesn't affect Doppler shift directly.

explanations.a: Incorrect – Sound waves are not transverse in air.
explanations.b: Correct – In gases, sound propagates as longitudinal waves.

explanations.a: Correct – Hertz (Hz) is the unit of frequency.
explanations.b: m/s is a unit of speed.
explanations.c: Ångström is a unit of length.
explanations.d: Watt is a unit of power.

questions.question: As the density of the medium increases, the speed of sound

explanations.a: Incorrect – Speed can increase depending on elasticity.
explanations.b: Correct – If elasticity is also high, speed increases.
explanations.c: Speed is affected by both density and elasticity.
